emails.subject: User email address enumeration vulnerability on LIDL Plus app
emails.bodyHtml: Hello, During our research on user account enumeration flaws on Estonian online services, we found that your mobile app is vulnerable to the exposure of registered user email addresses. The vulnerability report is attached. We would appreciate it if you could confirm receipt of this email to prevent us from reaching out to you through other channels. Best regards, Gregor Eesmaa Computer Science MSc student University of Tartu, Institute of Computer Science

emails.subject: User email address enumeration vulnerability on LIDL Plus app

Best regards, Gregor Eesmaa Computer Science MSc student University of Tartu, Institute of Computer Science

emails.subject: IKÜM taotlus seoses isikuandmete töötlemisega äpis LIDL Plus / GDPR Request Regarding Processing of Personal Data on LIDL Plus app
emails.bodyHtml:
Lugupeetud LIDL Plus äpi vastutav andmetöötleja

Pöördun, et edastada ametlikult mure isikuandmete kaitse üldmääruse (IKÜM) alusel seoses minu isikuandmete töötlemisega äpis LIDL Plus, mida pean ebaseaduslikuks ning mis võib viia nende avaldamiseni selleks volitamata isikutele ilma selge õigusliku aluseta.

Manuses on ametlik taotlus (samuti digiallkirjastatud kujul), milles teostan oma õigusi IKÜM artiklite 15, 18 ja 21 alusel. Palun selle läbivaatust ja vastavate meetmete võtmist ajaraamis, mis on sätestatud IKÜM artiklis 12(3) (üks kuu taotluse saamisest).

Palun teavitage taotluse kättesaamisest.

Lugupidamisega
Gregor Eesmaa

--

Dear Data Controller of LIDL Plus app,

I am contacting you to formally raise concerns under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) regarding what I believe to be the unlawful processing of my personal data by LIDL Plus app, potentially leading to its disclosure to unauthorised parties without a clear legal basis.

Please find attached a formal application (also in digitally signed form) exercising my rights under Articles 15, 18, and 21 of the GDPR. I request that you review and act upon it accordingly, within the timeframe established by Article 12(3) of the GDPR (one month from receipt).

Please confirm receipt of this request.

Kind regards,
Gregor Eesmaa

emails.subject: IKÜM taotlus seoses isikuandmete töötlemisega äpis LIDL Plus / GDPR Request Regarding Processing of Personal Data on LIDL Plus app
emails.bodyHtml:
Lugupeetud LIDL Plus äpi vastutav andmetöötleja

Pöördun, et edastada ametlikult mure isikuandmete kaitse üldmääruse (IKÜM) alusel seoses minu isikuandmete töötlemisega äpis LIDL Plus, mida pean ebaseaduslikuks ning mis võib viia nende avaldamiseni selleks volitamata isikutele ilma selge õigusliku aluseta.

Manuses on ametlik taotlus (samuti digiallkirjastatud kujul), milles teostan oma õigusi IKÜM artiklite 15, 18 ja 21 alusel. Palun selle läbivaatust ja vastavate meetmete võtmist ajaraamis, mis on sätestatud IKÜM artiklis 12(3) (üks kuu taotluse saamisest).

Palun teavitage taotluse kättesaamisest.

Lugupidamisega
Gregor Eesmaa


PS. Saatsin varem samasisulise emaili valelt meiliaadressilt.

--

Dear Data Controller of LIDL Plus app,

I am contacting you to formally raise concerns under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) regarding what I believe to be the unlawful processing of my personal data by LIDL Plus app, potentially leading to its disclosure to unauthorised parties without a clear legal basis.

Please find attached a formal application (also in digitally signed form) exercising my rights under Articles 15, 18, and 21 of the GDPR. I request that you review and act upon it accordingly, within the timeframe established by Article 12(3) of the GDPR (one month from receipt).

Please confirm receipt of this request.

Kind regards,
Gregor Eesmaa


PS. I sent the same email previously from the wrong email address.

emails.subject: Re: IKÜM taotlus seoses isikuandmete töötlemisega äpis LIDL Plus / GDPR Request Regarding Processing of Personal Data on LIDL Plus app
emails.bodyHtml:
Viitasin valesti vea ilmnemise kohad – viga esineb parooli lähtestamise vormil, kasutaja registreerimise vormil ja meiliaadressi vahetamise vormil. Parandatud taotlus manuses.

Lugupidamisega
Gregor Eesmaa

--

I mis-referenced vulnerable forms – the flaw is apparent in the password reset form, account registration form and email change form. Corrected request is attached.

Kind regards,
Gregor Eesmaa
